Camarillo.Rancho Campana High School: Rancho Campana High School is a new 800 student comprehensive academy high school for grades 9-12 that was built in 2015. The high school is located in Camarillo, California which is part of the Oxnard Union High School District. It is built on a 28-acre site in Camarillo (near the Camarillo Public Library) and will provide public education for the Camarillo and Somis communities.
